title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“The goods on garlic:...Garlic shots are a vicious measure of garlic-flavoured liquor.” [From The Globe and Mail, 20 September 1991. Submitted by Kurt Loeb, Downsview, Ontario.]
